testcase.name: Verify the right count of values are displayed on Home page
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to home page.......................passed Then check the text for each value is diplayed on home page.................passed

testcase.name: Verify values are greater on 0
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to home page.......................passed Then check each value displayed on screen are greater than 0................passed

testcase.name: Verify total balance is correct
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to home page.......................passed Then check total balance is "$1,000,000.00" as per the value displayed on home page screen.passed

testcase.name: Verify values are formatted as currency
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to home page.......................passed Then check each value on page are in "$" currency format....................passed

testcase.name: Verify total balance is equal to sum of all values
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser and navigate to home page.......................passed Then check total balance is equal to sum of all values on home page.........passed
